code: import React,{useEffect,useRef}from'react';import Chart from'chart.js/auto';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function BankrollChart(_ref){var bankroll=_ref.bankroll,bets=_ref.bets,growthRate=_ref.growthRate;var chartRef=useRef(null);useEffect(function(){var data=[];var currentBankroll=bankroll;for(var i=0;i<=bets;i++){data.push({x:i,y:currentBankroll});currentBankroll*=growthRate;}var chart=new Chart(chartRef.current,{type:'line',data:{datasets:[{label:'Bankroll Growth',data:data,fill:false,borderColor:'rgb(75, 192, 192)',tension:0.1}]},options:{scales:{x:{type:'linear',position:'bottom',title:{display:true,text:'Number of Bets'}},y:{type:'linear',position:'left',title:{display:true,text:'Expected Bankroll Value'},ticks:{callback:function callback(value,index,values){return'$'+value.toLocaleString('en-US',{minimumFractionDigits:0,maximumFractionDigits:0});}}}}}});return function(){return chart.destroy();};},[bankroll,bets,growthRate]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("canvas",{ref:chartRef});}export default BankrollChart;
